full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSRUNG MA DANG BLA TSE BKUG PA'I RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BSRUNG BA DANG TSE BSOD 'BOD PA'I RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES PA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GRAGS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS BGYIS, 'DI SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA BLA MA YI DAM CHOS SKYONG SOGS BSRUNG STZOL DANG TSE BSOD SROG BLA BRAG LTAR BRTAN PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
